overview: ECW Hostile City Showdown '94 sees Cactus Jack take to the ring to go one-on-one with Sabu in the main event. The Tazmaniac battles The Pitbull in a Dog Collar Match. Tommy Cairo and The Sandman meet in a Singapore Cane on a Pole Match. Plus, Tommy Dreamer is in action, The Funks face Public Enemy, and much more!
title: ECW Hostile City Showdown 1994
